app.name: kittysay
app.one_liner: cowsay, but with a cute kitty :3

screens.name: Main Output Screen
screens.purpose: Display the formatted message in a speech or thought bubble above the kitty ASCII art.
primary_actions: Apply color settings to message and kitty
Switch between speech and thought bubbles

rust_commands.name: render_kitty_message
rust_commands.purpose: Render a message with customizable width, colors, and bubble type (speech/think).

mvp_plan: week 1: Add support for color customization
week 1: Implement core rendering logic with width control
acceptance_tests: Default colors are bright white instead of dim (per v1.1.1 fix)
Tabs in input are replaced with spaces to preserve width accuracy
Think mode replaces speech bubbles with thought bubbles
Width parameter correctly adjusts speech bubble size up to terminal width
